headline: equipifi® Joins the Jack Henry™ Fintech Integration Network and Expands Access to Bank BNPL
summary: equipifi, the award-winning Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) platform for financial institutions, today announced that it has joined the Jack Henry™ Fintech Integration Network (FIN). Participating in the program had provided equipifi with access to Jack Henry's technical resources to expand the availability of its BNPL platform and integrate with SilverLake System®. The Fintech Integration Network is designed to help ensure that Jack Henry's customers can easily deploy third-party products.
